title: If a person misses the morning athkaar, can he say them after dhur? assim al hakeem JAL
transcript: foreign [Music] okay I I got your question so the question is if a person misses the morning at car can he say them after the time the answer is yes but he wouldn't be protected from Fajr all the way down till the time he says that car is prescribed at a specific time for a specific reason so if you fail to say the mod at that specific time this means that you won't be protected if you were to oversleep a Fajr and not wake up until you wake up you pray your Fajr prayer and then your dohor prayer and you say your mourning a scar and that would suffice you until the evening in [Music] have you ever taken a counseling session with me go to my website and you will find counseling sessions and apply for one if you can afford it that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled for one free session and this is for everybody if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot afford it because they're poor I'll give them one free session without a problem a full half an hour so come to me and let's speak about it inshallah within the following two days or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's guidance to solve the problem once and for Allah foreign foreign
